body: If this causes problems, two options are (1) don't inline code that mentions "unsafe" or (2) keep track of all pointers ever involved in unsafe.Pointer casts, and treat them as aliasing everything else unsafe.  That is, the "alias pointer type" becomes a pair (ReferentType, EverUnsafe) and p and q may-alias if `MayOverlap(RT(p),RT(q)) OR EU(p) AND EU(q)`.
